They will not give us it

verbs.hint: In Latin it is spelled cremare (or cremate)

examples.english: The dinner was burning -> The dinner was burning itself

examples.english: The dinner was burning in the pan
examples.spanish: La cena quemaba en la sartén

examples.english: I'm burning -> I was burning myself
I burn in the sun -> I burn myself in the sun
I burn the fish in the pan
examples.spanish: Quemo el pescado en la sartén
